Detailed Description

Class vtkTool, abstract the use of a surgical tool.

vtkTool abstracts the use of a surgical tool during the simulation exercise. This provide an easy use of surgical tools collections.

Member Function Documentation

void vtkTool::ApplyInitialTransform (  )  [virtual]

Applies the initial transformation to the tool loaded from vtk files.

Applies the initial transformation, placing the tool in its position in the scene.

void vtkTool::RotateX ( double  x  )  [protected]

Implements the lateral movements of the tool (Local coordinate system).

The X parameter contains the relative movement in the horizontal axes

Parameters:
x x orientation angle

Reimplemented in vtkToolLaparoscopy, and vtkToolPincers.

void vtkTool::RotateY ( double  y  )  [protected]

Implements the lateral movements of the tool (Local coordinate system).

The Y parameter contains the relative movement in the vertical axes

Parameters:
y y orientation angle

Reimplemented in vtkToolLaparoscopy, and vtkToolPincers.

void vtkTool::RotateZ ( double  rotation  )  [protected]

Rotate the tool on its own axes (Local coordinate system).

This function rotate the tool on its own axis the value of an angle given by the "Rotation" variable the rotation is produced acting on the actors who compose the tool.

Parameters:
rotation rotation angle (radians)

Reimplemented in vtkToolLaparoscopy, and vtkToolPincers.

void vtkTool::Translate ( double  x,
double  y,
double  z 
) [protected]

Implements the translation of the tool (Local coordinate system).

The X & Y parameters contains the relative movement in the horizontal and vertical axes respectively

Parameters:
x x position of the tool
y y position of the tool
z z position of the tool
